content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information regarding intake of rating claims submitted through VDC, including
workload management for VDC claims
review of VDC claims
Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS) exclusions on VDC claims
incremental EPs on VDC claims
incremental EP consolidation on VDC claims
, and
pre-discharge claims received through VDC
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A - The Veterans Online Application (VONAPP) Direct Connect (VDC) Program and Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Claims Submission Service Websites
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A
